title: Riak Office Hours Happening Today at 2PM Pacific at BashoWest
description:
July 13, 2011

Office Hours are happening again today at BashoWest. The planned time is from 2-5 Pacific, and if you’re in San Francisco and like talking about technology, there’s no excuse for you not to be here.

Today’s Office Hours are extra special: the majority of the Ripple Committer Team is in the office for the Hackathon and will be on hand to help answer any and all queries you might have. (It’s also worth noting that we have three shiny whiteboards to abuse, a new stock of RedBull, and a fresh shipment of Riak of swag…)

Official details are as follows:

  • When: Today, 2PM Pacific until about 5
  • Where: BashoWest – 929 Market St., Suite 500, San Francisco
  • How: Find “Basho” on the front door buzzer.
  • Who Should Come: Anyone with questions/comments/concerns about Riak, Erlang, open source software, community building, or databases.

Hope to see you this afternoon. Shoot an email to mark@basho.com or find me on twitter if you have any questions.

Mark
